item.description: Allright - I hate to have to cancel meetups - but three people dropped out on the last day and of the remaining four three haven't logged on to the system in over a month (I haven't been checking) and never posted what they were bringing despite a couple emails asking them to. So I'm assuming they will be no shows as well. Hopefully Biagio got my email saying I am going to cancel. I'll schedule another meeting for next month and hope that goes better.
item.name: First Meeting - Sicilian Food at Chris's place - CANCELLED!!!!!
